title: Unofficial Skin Templates - Thresh, Bard, and Jinx

replies.body:
I made one. It's called "Croquis Bard"

http://i.imgur.com/KZrudIG.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Am7h1vNQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-12-29T07:06:01.590+0000)
>
> I made one. It's called "Croquis Bard"
> 
> http://i.imgur.com/KZrudIG.jpg

2meta4me, Deep Terror Nami.

Please don't tease us with a Deep Terror Nami unless we're getting the skin.
Do you know how much money i'd throw at the screen if that really happened? Fizz got one (well it's called Void but still), I beg for Nami to get the same theme :D if possible. Otherwise keep up the good work with these upcoming skins!

Edit: I know the user above is called Deep Terror Nami, but the skin becoming a reality would be amazing.
it's the guy who made the comment's name bro!
If you knew the user's name was Deep Terror Nami you should also know they weren't teasing a skin!

Jeez, -5 votes? Guess being wishful for a future skin based off a user is insulting or something. I apologize.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
I upvoted you, I know it was a joke XD

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/001/058/450/8ff.gif

Wait, someone responded civilly instead of downvoting my reponse?
No sarcasm, you are a scholar and a gentlemen my friend.
XD Ok on a serious note, thx for these!
New skin comfirmed, concept art bard.

The joke 
.
.
.

Fiora please? :D

Your wish is my command:

http://i.imgur.com/1AlkEnn.jpg

Fiora template.  (Also, the outlines in the background of [this image](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/fu-banner.jpg?itok=S2TGxqzD) are good too for different, stylized, poses!)
Thank you thank you <3

Maokai.

I want to see you acknowledge that you gave a TREE a loincloth.

> [{quoted}](name=Nicole Watterson,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Am7h1vNQ,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-12-29T09:20:26.073+0000)
>
> Maokai.
> 
> I want to see you acknowledge that you gave a TREE a loincloth.

One Maokai.  I have no problem with him having a loincloth or shorts (I don't want to see his berries, after all) but I was surprised to see he doesn't have a thumb on his right hand.  Also, I'm not on the LoL team directly, so it's no skin off my nose if he's running around in his birthday suit or not :)

http://i.imgur.com/vAu20He.jpg

That reminds me - anyone else get a little weirded out when Groot handed the little Nowhere kid a flower grown from his hand?  I suspect I'm thinking about it way too hard.

Well, you gotta HAND it to him for being a nice guy.
Memes

Please oh mighty Bioluminescence, give us a Sion template.
Bioluminescence...

https://media.giphy.com/media/11t9sYRP19MFd6/giphy.gif
Should sticky and/or database. Having accurate wireframes would probably be great for a huge portion of the community that wants to create but needs a good basis to work from.

That'd be grand, but I don't think the ones I've drawn are high enough quality for that yet.  Still hoping that more skilled people will be able to contribute in the future, and my placeholder ones (while hopefully still useful) can be happily retired in favor of better ones! :D
Talon Plz Plz
" Croquis" is pronounced "crow-key" :)

Thanks, i was curious originally my thought was,
"I don't know what this word is, must be fancy
French is fancy
"Cro-Sh-k-waaz" that sounds right!!!
good to know its something simpler lol.
I would love a Tham Kench template. He need to have at least one good skin and I have this wonderful idea but Im a average artist. This template would help me drawing this idea way better!
I'd be much obliged if you were to give me a Mordekaiser one seeing that I'm toying with the idea of a Blood Moon Mordekaiser skin concept^^
Azir, Orianna, and Talon please :D

DRAVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVVEN Template. PLEASE! I can never get his axes right. Also vi too?
Azir too plz <3
{{champion:11}}, {{champion:24}} if you could kindly? That would be amazing. Please and thank you (even if you don't this thread is pretty cool)

BRUH.
Let's tell the world that we're now bruhs!
(you're my bruh, man)
You know why I whispered that to you?
'cus you're my world, bruh.
BRUH.
I can't thank you enough for these. I'm terrible at drawing and would like a template to mess around with. :D
Hopefully I can credit you when I upload any skin ideas. :3
